intro: Senecio heterotrichius, commonly known as the zigzag groundsel, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in arid or semi-arid environments. Its leaves are often covered in fine hairs, giving it a fuzzy appearance, and its flowers are yellow with a distinctive zigzag pattern in the flower head. Senecio heterotrichius is also known for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional herbal remedies.
